contest-event.event-date:
May 28, 1966 D Grand Shield British Open Spring Festival (Grand Shield) 10 Test Piece Contest British Open Spring Festival grand-shield Winners back to 1952 are as engraved on the current Grand Shield trophy. Except for 1981 to 1984 where the bands on the trophy appear to have come second, not first! Was a different trophy given to the winners? If you know the answer please let us know.

There are also results on the trophy from 1902 to 1938, but they are for the Crystal Palace Contest (see link at top of page). Main Street Belle Vue (Kings Hall), Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK May 1, 2010, 5:07 p.m. Aug. 20, 2011, 9:31 p.m. 1 Reg Vardy Band Eric Cunningham 2 Rockingham Band Edmund Hoole 3 Kibworth Band William Scholes 4 Brodsworth Colliery Band Ken Johnson Unknown Result 1st Old Boys Association Band (Belfast) Alfie Burch Unknown Result BMP (Europe) Goodshaw Band Frederick Lonsdale Garth Unknown Result City of Birmingham Band J.
